refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: 3dm-g converts the file.3dm Rhino3D file to a BRL-CAD file.g file.

BRL-CAD utilizes the OpenNURBS library for reading and processing 3dm files. Since BRL-CAD also uses this library internally for NURBS support, 3dm-g import is generally a very direct and relatively problem free conversion path.

listitem.para: Specify the output name of the .g file.
Randomize colors assigned to imported objects.

example.title: Verbose Reporting of Search Information
example.para: This example imports the BRL-CAD copy of NIST's MBE PMI models 7-10 to nist.g while randomizing the colors assigned to objects.

refsection.title: DIAGNOSTICS
refsection.para: User will see OpenNURBS diagnostic reporting as the 3dm file is read.
